definitions.definition: To separate into parts with force or sudden violence; to split ; to burst .
examples: Powder rends a rock in blasting.

definitions.definition: To violently disturb the peace of; to throw into chaos.
examples: a scream that rent the air

definitions.definition: To part or tear off forcibly; to take away by force; to amputate .
To be rent or torn; to become parted; to separate ; to split .
examples: Relationships may rend if tempers flare.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To separate into parts with force or sudden violence; to split ; to burst .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , figurative ) To violently disturb the peace of; to throw into chaos.
( transitive ) To part or tear off forcibly; to take away by force; to amputate .
( intransitive ) To be rent or torn; to become parted; to separate ; to split .
